quote: Kindness is the beauty of the heart and the smiles of the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Kindness, Iâ€™ve discovered, is everything in life.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Take every opportunity to express kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I think probably kindness is my number one attribute in a human being. I'll put it before any of the things like courage or bravery or generosity or anything else.Brian Sibley: Or brains even?Oh gosh, yes, brains is one of the least. You can be a lovely person without brains, absolutely lovely. Kindness - that simple word. To be kind - it covers everything, to my mind.If you're kind that's it.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Kindness is the greatest medicine that can heal all ills.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Next to love, kindness is the most beautiful thing.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we have to work at. Not everyone has it. But I think everyone has the potential. Sometimes you just have to look really close before you can tell it's there."-Kyoko
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Kindness is the master key which opens the gates of inner bliss.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be an advocate of love and kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness is the language of eternal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Knowing the truth is not always a kindness.
author: Rosamund Hodge,  Cruel Beauty

quote: Kindness and caring are ambrosia for the soul.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Choosing kindness is the ultimate expression of evolved consciousness. Grow by being kind.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Love and kindness are a kind of gun that we can use to change everyone without hurting anyone.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To help humanity, live with kindness and harmony.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What I want is so simple I almost can't say it: elementary kindness.
author: Barbara Kingsolver,  Animal Dreams

quote: Treat everyone with politeness and kindness, not because they are nice, but because you are.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Win the heart with love and win the hate with kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness and a generous spirit go a long way. And a sense of humor. It's like medicine - very healing.
author: Max Irons

quote: Let no one ever come to you without leaving better and happier. Be the living expression of God's kindness: kindness in your face, kindness in your eyes, kindness in your smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Kindness can transform someone's dark moment with a blaze of light. You'll never know how much your caring matters. Make a difference for another today.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Be kind to him who does not deserve your kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When kindness is your religion, then caring is your prayer.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Kindness has no religion. Religions are like narrow tracks but kindness is like an open sky.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: Daily love and kindness are the path to a happy life.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: I prefer you to make mistakes in kindness than work miracles in unkindness.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The fire of kindness can melt the most hateful heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be Generous with your Kindness, Compassion & Forgiveness.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Being present to yourself in love and with kindness is the ultimate gift.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: The best portion of a good man's life: his little, nameless unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth,  Lyrical Ballads

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: Be a fountain of love, positivity, kindness, and abundance.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: They are always saying God loves us. If that's love I'd rather have a bit of kindness.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses.
author: Confucius

quote: Be mindful. Be grateful. Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
author: Roy T. Bennett,  The Light in the Heart

quote: Greatness is achieved through kindness, compassion, and love.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Caring is what matters, not stuff or status, just people sharing kindness & joy in a web of the heart that spans the globe.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: To be kind, honest and have positive thoughts; to forgive those who harm us and treat everyone as a friend; to help those who are suffering and never to consider ourselves superior to anyone else: even if this advice seems rather simplistic, make the effort of seeing whether by following it you can find greater happiness.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: It's not enough to be nice in life. You've got to have nerve.
author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: Kind people have a way of working their way inside me and rooting there.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: Be a vessel of forgiveness and kindness in order to be a fountain of peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is made up, not of great sacrifices or duties, but of little things, in which smiles and kindness, and small obligations given habitually, are what preserve the heart and secure the comfort.
author: Humphy Davy

quote: I would rather make mistakes in kindness and compassion than work miracles in unkindness and hardness.
author: Mother Teresa,  A Gift for God: Prayers and Meditations

quote: A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
